column5: The neighbour was out today and found 15 inches of ice consistently on north Pigeon. More than I thought ?
Wow, that's more than I would have thought too!

I bet the ice will be off Temagami before a lot of southern lakes. Temag only had between 5.5 and 8 inches of black ice last week, in all the holes we drilled, the rest was just water, snow and white crap. Figure it will be the earliest ice out in history for the lake. Late ice and then 6 feet of snow not a recipe for good ice.
